__e: We live on different continents, but our hearts are always linked. This site's purpose is not only to inform about our past and presents by gathering stories and pictures but to reinforce our family ties. Enjoy your readings!
Although we know he is in a better place our hearts are still heavy over this great loss, a true hero to his family.
All the way from Louisiana just to see me, the big mamma jamma. Now, I want a ball in this hall, because he's a real doll.
There's no time for gloom in our hearts and minds
It is good for us to know all we can about one another should we continue the joining of our hearts and our blood.
With it, some can stir the soul with music. Others can read the truth in men's hearts and forgive.
And they prayed, and said, Thou Lord, knower of the hearts of all, shew which one of these two thou hast chosen,
Father... by the power of Your spirit...
